name: AVContentKeySpecifier
desc: An object that uniquely identifies a content key.

items.name: init(forKeySystem: AVContentKeySystem, identifier: Any, options: [String : Any])
var identifier: Any
items.desc: The container and protocol-specific key identifier.

items.name: var keySystem: AVContentKeySystem
items.desc: The key system that generates content keys.

items.name: var options: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of options with which you initialized the specifier.
